extendedInfo.description: With a journey into space, you can enjoy Classical and beautiful shooting game.The enemies, the bullets are trying to kill you, so you are expected to shoot enemy.Bounces bullets are so unique to this game.Every time you challenge, new story are waiting.--FeaturesThe great features is controlling.Quite simple,Just put your finger on a display anywhere you want, and move as you like.Smooth movements are promised.This game is recommend to use horizontal style.--ObjectiveCompete for the highest score in an endless shooting game,Practice, practice, practice to achieve No.1 position in the world!!Find us on facebook.

reviews.title: Physics based shooter/shmup
reviews.comment: Fun game. Slightly boring and repetitive levels are offset by fun and unique bosses. The game is not 100% polished (there\'s no indication that you\'re doing any damage to bosses, for example) but still fun for what it is.  It\'s a bit weird to have physics in a shmup, and it doesn\'t really add much to the experience, but it\'s no big deal.
reviews.author: A Google User
